SEARCH
Package lol.jisz.astra.utils

Class Logger

java.lang.Object
lol.jisz.astra.utils.Logger
public class Logger extends Object
A utility class for handling plugin logging with enhanced formatting and color support. This logger provides various methods for sending formatted messages to the console, players, or broadcasting to all players. It supports colored messages, debug mode, and custom prefixes.

The logger can be configured to use colors or not, and can be set to debug mode to display additional information when needed.
